cluster_relations.rel_desc: Ghostly apparitions are presented as a type of supernatural or paranormal phenomenon within urban legends.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a more specific subtype, kind, or form within the broader category represented by the object.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: NarrativeContext: elements of urban legend stories

args.justification: The relation expresses a type–instance (member-of) taxonomic link: the specific story details of the Hook Man legend are an instance of the broader class 'urban legends'. Such membership is best modeled as a taxonomic hierarchy rather than pure IDENTITY. Aligning rel_cls_group to 'HIERARCHY' and using a more precise rel_cls 'taxonomic_instance_relation' keeps it consistent with the subtype taxonomic modeling used in RelR_8deeeec9c025 while preserving the existing canonical_rel_name 'is_instance_of'.
